column7: Continued development of reading, writing and conversational skills. This is considered a third level course for purposes of fulfilling the University General Education Language requirement. Credit is not given for both SPAN 130 and SPAN 103. Prerequisite: SPAN 102, SPAN 122 or equivalent placement score.
column9: Credit is not given for both SPAN 130 and SPAN 103. Prerequisite: SPAN 102, SPAN 122 or equivalent placement score.
column11: Class meetings constitute half of the credit hour requirement, the other half is met by on-line, web-based work. Spanish native speakers should enroll in SPAN 125.
